poem:
**Pixelated Battlegrounds**

On digital plains where veterans play,  
Gramps in command, cloak of display—  
Joysticks rattle like old bones sing,  
Twitch-lit arena, pixelated king.

Bless your heart, her battle cry,  
Crossfire laughter, hear her fly;  
Digital kin in a virtual sprawl,  
In this coded world, she conquers all.
